title: Help
body:

because of that deleted part of C drive

replies.body: The game will fail to render properly and can become corrupt if it doesn't have access to files in order to run.  I recommend trying our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to do a clean reinstall and get everything into one place.  Hope that helps!
